WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Are you able to send mails over this page: Admin/Email.aspx ??
If not, check/ change your email settings and try again.
Your error message is not caused by lazy programming  :)
WorkItem.Description:
Can someone please help...
I keep getting the following error when trying to recover a password.
It asks the user name, then the Security question perfectly. But once you enter the Security Answer and hit Submit, then I get this error.
Any ideas? I get no other Database errors though out the site and everything connects fine.
Thanks in advance.
